amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the amount for energy efficiency and renewable energy by $491,000,000 and decrease the National Nuclear Security Administration weapons activities account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase energy efficiency and renewable energy by $491,000,000 and decrease the National Nuclear Security Administration weapons activities account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 546).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 546).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Welch.
